nodes.bodyText: I renamed it to queueTileProvider since onTileProviderQueue is ambiguous (not clear whether queue is a continuation of the noun or if it's a verb).
mbtilesFilePaths maybe? (since this doesn't actually contain the data)
Same here: add instead of render
Can this inner lambda be extract to its own method for readability?
Could you short circuit exit here instead and Timber.info the fact the the file was not found?
Could you kindly add a TODO and Code health task to create our own wrapper interface/impl for these?

Not sure queue is the right name here, since it implies an actual queue is being used, and not a stream. In this case "add" would be correct, since it's really a deferred add operation, but this can be changed later if we like.
